description.translate: Flawless, it protects and serves the familly that gave birth to it.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Garde famille\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Sans failles, il protège et sert\"}","{\"text\":\"§7la famille qui l'a vu naître.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Flawless, it protects and serves\"}","{\"text\":\"§7the familly that gave birth to it.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7RES§a1 §7LUC§a1\"}"]}}
